description:
The course is about Credit Control Procedures. There's a video to explain the concept and downloadable templates which you can use in your own business.

The course will take approx 1 hour to complete.

It's an ideal course if you are working in the accounts / finance department and/or if you are thinking of embarking on a career in accountancy or bookkeeping and part of your requirement is to manage the debtors ledger.

If you are thinking of starting your own business and want to understand how to collect in your money and minimise bad debt then this course is for you.
title: Credit Control Procedures
